    • Method Detail

      • toUrl

        public String toUrl()
        Description copied from class: AbstractPageClass
        The url for the said page. Please implement this method in your page classes and return the respective url for the page. In case the page dont have any url just return and empty string. *

        Note:Do not append the base url to this url as it is automatically appended at runtime.

        Specified by:
        toUrl in class AbstractPageClass
        Returns:
        - Page url without appending the base url.

      • at

        public boolean at()
        Description copied from class: AbstractPageClass
        Method used to verify whether the driver object is on the said page or not. Return true or false based on the criteria to identify whether driver object is on the said page or not.

        This is a very important method as it will help in making you Page object model tests robust as it will help you to validate the Page is shown before any of the util methods of the said page is executed. Note: For better results do not store your evaluated condition in a variable. Try to evaluate the success condition everytime this method gets executed.

        Specified by:
        at in class AbstractPageClass
        Returns:
        true or false based on the page verification condition.

      • init

        public void init()
        Description copied from class: AbstractPageClass
        Use this method in case you want to initialize some variables or data while creating an Object of you Page class. This method will automatically get executed whenever you use AbstractPageClass.to(Class) or AbstractPageClass.at(Class) utils. In case you have nothing initialize just implement an empty method.
        Specified by:
        init in class AbstractPageClass
